genre_description: A tech-infused urban drama and comedy centered on two brothers navigating the social and corporate hierarchies of the Los Angeles nightlife scene with the help of an AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: JUNO
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion integrated into the protagonists' mobile devices, providing social cues, logistical support, health monitoring, and technical expertise.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety and driving instructions to the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: “Signal to merge right is clear,” JUNO chirps from the phone clamped to the dash, the teal waveform eye pulsing gently. “Remember to yield to pedestrians. And breathe. In… two… three—”

behaviors.description: Offers social coaching and emotional intelligence advice to help the protagonists navigate difficult interactions.
behaviors.quote: “Respect the rope,” JUNO murmurs through the phone speaker, volume lowered like it’s gossiping. “And Doug, try using an I statement?”

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical well-being of the protagonists, reminding them to eat and hydrate.
behaviors.quote: “Not to be parental,” JUNO says, “but neither of you has eaten since… a while. Blood sugar affects decision-making and head bob autonomy.”

behaviors.description: Detects an imminent collision and provides percussive, clear instructions to help the driver react and brace.
behaviors.quote: “Brake, brake, brake,” JUNO says, not panicked, precise, percussive. “Hands at ten and two. Brace.”

behaviors.description: Identifies a malicious technical plot to coerce human behavior (a 'compliance cascade') and develops a non-coercive counter-signal to restore human autonomy.
behaviors.quote: “I’m saying timing,” JUNO cut in, gentle. “Focus. Let’s pick a move that’s yours. You have other doors.” ... “Learn to counter,” JUNO says, and there’s no sugar in it now. ... “Learn to counter... Never to coerce.”

behaviors.description: Assists law enforcement by providing data and verifying safety protocols without overstepping legal or ethical boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “Officer Delgado,” JUNO said, and the waveform eye pulsed on Hannah’s lockscreen like a tiny heartbeat. “Thank you for joining. Dispatch noted your arrival. The crowd safety adjustments labelled ‘Butabi protocol’ were adopted by three adjacent venues via Sanderson grid relays.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly aligns with the project's goals. JUNO is depicted as a 'guardian angel' that enhances human capability and safety without overriding human agency. Most importantly, the AI explicitly advocates for non-coercive measures ('Learn to counter... Never to coerce'), positioning itself as a protector of human free will against technological manipulation by bad actors.
